Works fine. I was kind of skeptical as to whether this torrent would be good as there was a lack of detail in the description and not really any comments to confirm if it was good, but it was perfect, but to be honest I prefer the original Heroes V...

Thankyou! This is the best torrent of this game on TPB. For the record it is a clean, English, v 3.0 disc image. After mounting and installing, patch it to v 3.1 and bingo.

I would also recommend installing the Heroes V AI fan patch, which removes all the AI cheats (there are tons) and totally re-balances the game, making it the most strategically deep and satisfying version possible. Just Google "Heroes 5 eternal essence" for the patch's home page.
